text: MWAHAHAHAHA!!! It is I, Aureli, ruler of this land!! You may have defeated my lackeys in battle, {player name}, but I am much stronger than they are! The Calculus Chamber will be mine, forever! There is nothing you can do to stop me! MWAHAHAHAHA!
speaker: aureli

text: This is it, your final battle. Aureli is a formidable opponent. She will test you in all AB & BC Calculus topics. I believe in you, {player name}, your training has led up to this moment. Use the calculus concepts to your advantage, defeat the Aureli Nation once and for all!
speaker: pythagoras
